title: [Large-Scale] Practice-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Strengthening Pharmaceutical Education Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational pharmaceutical knowledge and educational field experience
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented educational program for current pharmacists and prospective pharmacy educators

learning_goals: Participants achieve a knowledge acquisition rate of over 80% in five core modules: instructional design, educational evaluation, leadership development, academic administration, and practicum supervision.
Participants can design three effective instructional strategies through workshops based on real educational scenarios.
Over 70% of participants enter education-related roles (instructor/preceptor) within two years of completing the course.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
